snippet: The rock-star candidate who got elected on his electrifying promise has become a bored bird in a gilded cage.
abstract: Maureen Dowd Op-Ed column laments that Pres Obama's disdain for politics has served to alienate him from many of his stalwart Democratic supporters in Congress; laments that Obama has sunk into some petulant expression of his aloofness at a time when the country needs a president to illuminate and lead.
lead_paragraph: The rock-star candidate who got elected on his electrifying promise has become a bored bird in a gilded cage.
